text:
Harlem River, Manhattan: A northwestward view of the Manhattan shoreline showing buildings at the foot of East 116th Street. The new East River Drive, skirting the waters edge has caused major changes in this locality, prominent of which is the disappearance of the ferry slips at the foot of the aforementioned point.

July 19, 1937.

P. L. Sperr.
title: Harlem River - Manhattan - East 116th Street.
